# Lex Intel

> Chinese AI intelligence pipeline and MCP server. Scrapes 11 Chinese-language
> sources daily, translates and analyzes articles with Claude, and serves
> curated intelligence through 21 MCP tools. Built by chrbailey, a
> service-disabled veteran-owned small business (SDVOSB).

Data is refreshed daily via automated scraping. Articles are translated from
Chinese, categorized into 13 domains, scored for relevance (1-5), and
synthesized into Bloomberg-style intelligence briefings. Multi-agent
orchestration runs 7 specialized agents autonomously.

## Core Documentation
- [README](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/README.md): Project overview, MCP tool reference, setup guide
- [Architecture](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/docs/MULTI_AGENT_ARCHITECTURE.md): Multi-agent system design and data flow

## Integration
- [MCP Server Config](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/README.md#run-the-mcp-server): How to connect the MCP server to Claude Code, Cursor, or any MCP client
- [MCP Tool Reference](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/README.md#mcp-tools): All 21 tools with parameters and usage guidance

## Agent System
- [Agent Definitions](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/tree/main/.claude/agents): 7 core agents + 4 rotating guest agents
- [Orchestrator](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/.claude/orchestrate.py): Multi-agent pipeline runner (daily, weekly, email, status modes)

## Blueprints (Cross-Repo Standards)
- [Repository Standards](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/blueprints/repo-standards.md): Master conventions for all chrbailey repos
- [llms.txt Template](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/blueprints/llms-txt.md): How to create llms.txt for any repo
- [GitHub Pages Setup](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/blueprints/github-pages.md): Agent-optimized static site pattern
- [CLAUDE.md Standard](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/blueprints/claude-md.md): Template for Claude Code project files
- [Agent Publishing](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/blueprints/agent-publishing.md): Automated content publishing pipeline
- [Hub Site Design](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/blueprints/hub-site.md): chrbailey.github.io master site blueprint

## Optional
- [CLI Commands](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/README.md#cli-commands): Manual pipeline commands
- [Article Categories](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/README.md#article-categories): 13 classification categories
- [Database Schema](https://github.com/chrbailey/lex-intel/blob/main/supabase/migrations/001_initial_schema.sql): Supabase table definitions
